medical_history.chief_complaint: Congenital hallux varus of the right foot.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms were noted at birth, and surgery was performed when the patient was 4 years old due to domestic problems postponing the operation. The medial first toe deviated medially at the metatarsophalangeal joint, with the formation of the medial first toe being hypoplastic.
medical_history.family_history: No deformity was seen in other family members.
medical_history.social_history: The patient's treatment was delayed until age 4 due to social factors.
